Package sbw.architecture.support

Class Logger

java.lang.Object
sbw.architecture.support.Logger
public class Logger extends Object
Defines a singleton logger for reporting all messaging-related traffic in CSV (comma-separated-value) format. The output filename and location cannot be changed.

    • getInstance

    • log

      public void log(String action, A_Component<?> component, Notification<?> notification, boolean isSequenced, String... values)
      Writes a log entry.
      Parameters:
      action - - the arbitrary action to report
      component - - the component performing the action
      notification - - the notification resulting from the action
      isSequenced - - whether to include a sequencing index to help sort the fields in a spreadsheet; the index increments by one afterwards
      values - - any arbitrary values to log; commas are interpreted as CSV delimiters

    • log

      public void log(String action, A_Component<?> component, RequestInform<?> request)
      Writes a log entry.
      Parameters:
      action - - the arbitrary action to report
      component - - the component performing the action
      request - - the request processed by the bus

    • log

      public void log(String action, Bus bus, A_Request request)
      Writes a log entry.
      Parameters:
      action - - the arbitrary action to report
      bus - - the bus reporting the action
      request - - the request processed by the bus

    • log

      public void log(String action, Bus bus, Response response)
      Writes a log entry.
      Parameters:
      action - - the arbitrary action to report
      bus - - the bus reporting the action
      response - - the response to the action
